name: Backrooms Rush
description:
Hi! I am Landry, the developer of the game Backrooms Rush. This project is a real challenge for me and teaches me a lot on the Unreal Engine 5 technologies (the game's engine). My goal is to make the most realistic, immersive and faithful game on the Backrooms universe as an indie developer. This wiki will show you all the aspect of the game I want to develop for the release. Many thanks to those who support me along this project. Follow me if you want to get news of the project: https://linktr.ee/landry_gd😉

More info in the Fandom Wiki: https://backrooms-rush.fandom.com/wiki/Backrooms_Rush_Wiki

The game launcher: https://we.tl/t-MZ5CXsI5fI
